***** Hindi[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
From अर्थ (arth, “meaning”) +‎ -पूर्ण (-pūrṇ, “full”).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * (Delhi Hindi) IPA(key): /əɾ.t̪ʰə.puːɾɳ/
**** Adjective[edit] ****
अर्थपूर्ण • (arthapūrṇ) (indeclinable)
   1. meaningful
***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [əɾtʰəpuːɾnə]
**** Adjective[edit] ****
अर्थपूर्ण • (arthapūrṇa) (Newa Spelling 𑐀𑐬𑑂𑐠𑐥𑐹𑐬𑑂𑐞)
   1. meaningful, expressive
